com.poesys.db.dao.update

Interface IUpdateCollection<T extends IDbDto>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of IDbDto to update
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UpdateCacheCollectionByKey, UpdateCollectionByKey, UpdateMemcachedCollectionByKey

    public interface IUpdateCollection<T extends IDbDto>
    An interface for a Command pattern class that updates a collection of data transfer objects (DTOs) in the database. The implementation identifies the objects to update based on the primary key contained in the DTO. The concrete implementation should specify what aspects of the object it updates. The implementation should update in the database only if isChanged() is true.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      An interface for a Command-pattern class that updates the contents of a collection of objects in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(java.sql.Connection connection,
          java.util.Collection<T> dtos)
            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                   BatchException
        An interface for a Command-pattern class that updates the contents of a collection of objects in the database. The data transfer objects (DTOs) must contain values for the primary key and must have all modifiable fields set to reflect the complete, desired state for the object in the database, including any composite aggregate parts belonging to the object.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection with which to update the data
        dtos - the data transfer objects containing the desired state of the objects
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there is a SQL error with an update
        BatchException - when there is some kind of batch processing error

      • isLeaf

        boolean isLeaf()
        Is this inserter inserting into a leaf class?
        Returns:
        true if leaf, false if superclass of a leaf

      • setLeaf

        void setLeaf(boolean isLeaf)
        Set the inserter to be a leaf inserter.
        Parameters:
        isLeaf - true for a leaf inserter, false for a superclass inserter

      • close

        void close()
        Close any resources allocated by the Command.
